item.title: Ranking. help!
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Add this to my client.java?

public static void createConnection() {
try {
Class.forName(“com.mysql.jdbc.Driver”).newInstance();
con = DriverManager.getConnection(“jdbc:mysql://65.75.244.232/highscores”,“root”,"");
stmt = con.createStatement();
} catch (Exception e) {
//e.printStackTrace();
}
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 11:03:53 am[/size][hr]Ops i added in SQL.java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 11:17:50 am[/size][hr]I think i have some kind of MYSQL error… trying to fix. ERROR to start mysql …

item.title: Ranking. help!

item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Its because you set them as.
http://localhost/highscores//images/overall.png

It must be on your IP like
http://65.75.244.232/highscores//images/overall.png

item.title: Ranking. help!
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

public static void createConnection() { try { Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver").newInstance(); con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/highscores","USERNAME","PASSWORD"); stmt = con.createStatement(); } catch (Exception e) { //e.printStackTrace(); }

Have you Mysql’ed your server?
